articles.author: Mihir Vasavda
articles.title: Asian Games: Chirag Shetty summons ‘Nadal-like’ resilience to overcome illness and partner Satwiksairaj Rankireddy to historic badminton gold - The Indian Express
articles.description: The duo continued their impressive 2023 season to defeat South Korean duo of Choi Solgyu and Kim Won Ho won India's first-ever badminton gold medal at the Asiad
articles.content: Satwiksairaj Rankireddy has a new name for Chirag Shetty. Rafael Nadal, Satwik laughs. He never gives up. I could see it this week.They joke about it now, nearly 30 minutes after winning the countrys… [+4553 chars]
